mapper.insert: insert into message (user_id, template_code, title, content, status) values (#{userId}, #{templateCode}, #{title}, #{content}, #{status})
mapper.select: select * from message where user_id = #{userId} order by created_at desc
mapper.update: update message set status = 'READ', read_at = #{readAt} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from message where user_id = #{userId} and status = 'UNREAD'
